## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 40,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock to cover forecasted demand and potential variability, while avoiding excess inventory buildup.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Higher than player's planned purchase of 50,000 units, taking into account lead time and potential demand variability. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | ~2 days                                  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | ~6 days                                  |
| Comments                          | Ordering 40,000 units will cover 5 days of forecasted demand with a buffer for potential variance. This allows for multiple orders to be placed and fulfilled within the shelf life, reducing the risk of spoilage. |
